mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.MEMBER_NM AS REG_USER_NM FROM TB_COMMENT A, TB_MEMBER B WHERE A.REG_USER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID AND A.BOARD_NO = #{board_no} ORDER BY A.COMMENT_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_COMMENT (BOARD_NO, MENU_ID , CONTENT, REG_USER_ID, REG_DATE) VALUES (#{board_no}, #{menu_id},#{content},#{reg_user_id},now())
